Node.definition: = man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= member of tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)|= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which humans who find themselves in difficult circumstances put their trust in someone else, ► in order to find protection or safety
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation

Node.gloss: to tear to pieces|to maul|to mangle
Node.definition: = action by which a person or animal is cut up and killed with one's claws and/or teeth ► for food or in order to enlarge one's territory; ≈ associated with terrifying and deadly viciousness

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression, fearlessness, and respect

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= the state of being or acting in an unjust or morally evil way

literally: palm of the hand, but used in a figurative sense with the focus on the activities that are performed with one's hands; = someone's actions, whether or not performed with one's hands, for which one is personally responsible
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= action by which humans or deities act towards a person in a way that has consequences and can result either in retribution or a reward
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong
= causative action by which deities bring humans out of a dangerous situation
= person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= action by which humans succeed to catch up with other humans after having pursued them

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
literally: glory; hence: = the inner person of a human being ◄ as the glory and pride of that individual
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke

Node.gloss: to lift up oneself = to come into action
Node.definition: literally: to lift oneself up; hence: = action by which deities come in action after a time of inactivity
= person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
= action by which someone ends a period of inactivity and comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time
= event where a dispute between two parties is settle by a judge
= a large gathering of humans or creatures ► usually for a specific purpose
= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language
literally: to go around; hence: = action by which groups of humans or animals take position all around an individual, a group, or an object
read ישׁב (ישׁב)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to judge|to pass judgment|to vindicate|to rule
Node.definition: = action by which someone gives a verdict on a case or person in a dispute and ensures that the verdict is implemented, which, ideally, results in relief for the innocent and punishment for the guilty; this can only be done by someone in authority, such as a judge or ruler or even God himself
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= process by which an event comes to a completion
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong
literally: to be established; hence: = causative process by which deities help humans to find security and stability
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

= action by which humans or deities examine the character of other humans or deities by having them engage in a certain activity, ◄ as a goldsmith tests the quality of a precious metal by smelting it in the fire
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
literally: kidney; hence: = seat of a person's emotions and devotion to God, created by God, and hidden to everyone but God himself
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
= person whose behavior is morally and ethically right
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: to express one's anger|to vent one's anger
Node.definition: = action by which deities or humans give free expression to their anger regarding someone else

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
literally: to turn; hence: = process by which humans or deities change their mind about a certain matter, ► which usually results in a different course of action
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
literally: to hammer; hence: = causative action by which humans use an iron tool to cause an object to have a thin cutting edge, ► in order to make it useful and effective as a tool
= a strong but flexible piece of wood to which a string is attached for the firing of arrows, ► used for hunting or as weapon of war
= causative action by which humans bend a bow (קֶשֶׁת) by drawing its string towards them ► in order to shoot an arrow

Node.gloss: to prepare|to make ready|to make provisions (for something)
Node.definition: = causative action where humans or deities make objects ready for use

Node.gloss: to prepare|to make ready|to make provisions (for something)
Node.definition: = causative action where humans or deities make objects ready for use
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= process by which humans or animals stop living

= pointed missile, shot from a bow; slender and straight in shape and moving swiftly; ◄ made out of wood and/or iron; ► mainly used for hunting, in warfare, and occasionally for divination; ≈ symbol of aggression, affliction, and punishment
= process by which an object is affected or consumed by fire
= action by which a person or deity carries out some purposeful activity, in order to create something or cause something to happen
= action by which living creatures give birth; ≈ also used in a figurative sense to refer to causing things to happen
= great wickedness and depravity, as a trait of certain human beings, which is expressed in thoughts, words, and actions; ≈ regarded as unacceptable and worthy of punishment by God
= process by which someone becomes pregnant
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety
literally: falsehood; hence: = state in which things that are being communicated are factually untrue

= hole in the ground, big enough to hold a person and deep enough that a person cannot climb out; ◄ usually dug out of the ground or hewn from rock; ► often used to collect and store rain water; ≈ fresh water from a spring is considered superior to stagnant water from a cistern
= action by which humans break up and move earth or stone, usually with a tool, and with the purpose of creating a hole
= action by which humans break up and move earth, usually with a tool, and with the purpose of creating a hole
= process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control
= action by which a person or deity carries out some purposeful activity, in order to create something or cause something to happen

Node.gloss: to be repaid|to be paid back|to be punished
Node.definition: literally: to come back on (someone's) head; hence: = process by which humans receive the appropriate return for their actions, which are mostly evil

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= upper part of the head; ≈ sometimes used in conjunction with feet (רֶגֶל) to refer to the whole physical body
= to behave aggressively towards someone with which one has a relationship; ► usually in order to enrich oneself in one way or another

Node.gloss: to come down on one's skull
Node.definition: literally: to descend on one's skull; hence: = state in which humans are held responsible for their deeds
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
literally: name; hence: = the core of one's identity, which reflect the essence of one's being
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= an epithet for the God of Israel ◄ as the one who not only lives in the highest heavens but is also worthy of the highest honor
